title: Your Snowdown Shop Still not active.
body:
I was super excited for Snowdown Shop that was supposed to be released at 17:01 AEDT on the 16th of December. It's now 19:01 and there's still no Snowdown Shop in client.

I hope someone at Riot sees this. Also links to sources can be found [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/look-out-its-snowdown), just scroll down the FAQ for Snowdown Shop.

replies.body:
**UPDATE**

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=EloA9Tdr,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2015-12-16T09:44:33.473+0000)
>
> Hey there, Your Snowdown Shop is currently experiencing issues. We are working to get this fixed ASAP.
> 
> EDIT: Confirming that we're rolling this out to stores server by server, and discovering/fixing any issues along the way. This roll out will continue and Your Snowdown Shop will come to OCE ASAP.


                                                                         **ANOTHER UPDATE FOR MYSTERY SKINS**
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=EloA9Tdr,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2015-12-16T10:29:51.469+0000)
>
> Hi there Wenyu, This is my fault as I fixed the issue with Mystery Chests not being available but didn't 100% confirm that they could be extended before making that announcement. Regrettably, as you can tell, we weren't able to extend the duration of Mystery Chests this time.
> I'm sorry about the frustration this causes and will be sure to be more diligent in future when managing these issues.
Im not sure where I got it from, but the snowdown stuff usually started on 9PM AEDT like when the mode, and skins came out, probably snowdown shop will be like that aswell.
Its past 9PM AEDT right now isnt it? Its 6:30 AWST and its still not up :/
Im not sure whats happening then :/ On NA it's bugged out also

I thought it might be late haha. I'm more annoyed that I own Pulsefire Ezreal and the damn shop gives me 2 Ezreal skins on discount...

Yeah gee thanks for personalising that for me. Never used or wanted to use a different Ezreal skin lol. 6 skins and only 2 of them are for champs I dont already have skins for.

Now if there were a skin for Thresh, Fiora, Swain or Jinx in there... That's when Id be throwing money at Riot.
So snowdown shop opened for me and got discount on challenger Ahri but it wont let me purchase it :( it keeps saying "error, give it another go?" like wth, riot pls
i cant wait to get me the 49 skins im getting haha

It's cool to see everyone so excited for Your Snowdown Shop!

Unfortunately there were some issues with getting the feature up and running perfectly. There is a team working on this issue as I type this and we hope to have Your Snowdown Shop working and available to you as soon as possible.

Thanks so much for your patience!
Will the Snowdown Shops's availability be extended because of this?

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=PwKPEiw6,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-12-16T19:29:35.877+0000)
>
> Will the Snowdown Shops's availability be extended because of this?

i hope so
the release for snowdown shop was mistakenly reported in aedt. TLDR the time was actually in na time
17th December 2015 12:28 AM AEDT still nothing I have been waiting all day for it so please fix it.

ive been waiting for so long now
{{champion:32}}

guys calm down, it says

> Check out Your Snowdown Shop, **opening soon!**

Chill guys, its Rito's famous Soonâ„¢
